headline: TD Cowen bullish on nat gas players but cuts Occidental rating on oil headwinds
summary: Investing.com -- TD Cowen upgraded gas-weighted energy stocks like Antero Resources (NYSE:AR), Expand Energy , Gulfport Energy (OTC:GPORQ) given an improved natural gas outlook following recent U.S. tariff announcements, but it downgraded Occidental Petroleum (NYSE:OXY) due to growing oil-related headwinds.

headline: Occidental Petroleum price target lowered to $44 from $52 at UBS
summary: UBS lowered the firm’s price target on Occidental Petroleum (OXY) to $44 from $52 and keeps a Neutral rating on the shares. The firm sees Energy viewed as a recession downside play, the analyst tells investors in a research note. UBS lowered its price target reflecting increased uncertainty around economic activity and commodity prices. headline: Occidental receives permits to sequester CO₂ from Texas facility
summary: The permits allows Occidental to use its expertise managing large quantities of CO₂, while advancing technology that strengthens US energy security.
